featured.text: Founded in 1992, with some 28,000 listings, this company itself as the world’s largest home exchange club, reporting that membership has increased 30% this year.

definition.zh_def: 一個人們聚集在一起進行社交、娛樂或活動的組織或場所。
definition.en_def: A group of people organized for a common purpose, often for social or recreational activities.
definition.example: She joined a book club to meet new friends and discuss her favorite novels.
